title: Friends gift not showing up
body: my friend was trying to gift me a champion, he says he gifted it to my account and my name but it hasn't shown up, I fifgured I would wait a day or two to see if it took some time to process but it's not appearing. It apparently charged him the RP so is there a glitch or bug that could be happening?

replies.body: Hmmmm yea I'm not seeing any gifts on your account so that may not have gone through at all. If you can give me your friends Summoner Name I can check on his end to see what might have happened!

His summoner name is Coolerstealh

yes, spelled exactly like that.

Looks like your friend might have misspelled your name due to the ø in it, and the gift was sent to someone else. Your friend will need to submit a ticket to our billing team to see if it's possible to get that reversed or not.
